name: WAEV INC.
description: Manufacturer of low speed electric vehicles
sampleDescriptions: Discuss benefits of electric low speeds vehicles (LSVs).
Support efforts to extend commercial and clean vehicle tax credits to LSVs in the implementation of P.L. 117-169, Inflation Reduction Act.
